title: phpEdu demo
body: This demo site represents the current codebase for phpEdu (http://drupal.org/project/phpedu) and phpEdu Profile distribution (http://drupal.org/project/phpedu_profile). It gets refreshed frequently, so you may not see any changes you might have made while playing around with it. All user passwords are set as "pass". Some of the useful accounts are: By the way, most of the data relate to Arsenal FC as well as famous sports stars.
